Source.SQL Query:
SELECT seq_id SL, C001 Item_no, C002 Item_name, C003 Unit, C004 CPU, C005 RPU, C006 QTY, C005*C006 TOTAL 
FROM APEX_COLLECTIONS WHERE COLLECTION_NAME = 'PURCHASE';

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
select ID,
       VOUCHER_NO,
       ITEM_NO,
       ITEM_NAME,
       UNIT,
       CPU,
       RPU,
       QTY,
       apex_item.hidden(01, ITEM_NO)||apex_item.text(02, QTY) RETURN_QTY
  from PURCHASE__DETAILS 
  where VOUCHER_NO= :P20_VOUCHER_NO

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)
